it.polimi.ingsw.ps42.model.position

Class CouncilPosition

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.ps42.model.position.Position
      • it.polimi.ingsw.ps42.model.position.CouncilPosition

  • public class CouncilPosition
extends Position
    Implementation of the Council position, the table will have an arrayList of this class. Gives the player the right to receive a Privilege, then converted in a resource, in addiction he has an advantage for playing first in the next round.
    Author:
    Luca Napoletano, Claudio Montanari
